[This post contains a brief introduction and
review for a yaoi novel.  The =
post does not 
actually contain yaoi and is rated-G.]

Dear Friends,

I've =
read the early drafts of GOJOU HAJIME, a 
work of yaoi so here is my review=
 of the work...

Whereas well known films like TABOO/GOHATTO move
at a medi=
tative pace and leaves key narrative themes
up to viewer interpretation GOJ=
OU HAJIME is the exact 
opposite.  The novel's pace is very even and balanc=
es out
the chapters by switching between the various pairings and
leaves *n=
othing* to the imagination.

What struck me the most about GH is the tone o=
r voice of the
writing is very youthful and matches the age range of the 
m=
ain characters.  One will notice how effective this "voice" is
in regards t=
o the Hajime and Okita pairing.  The humorous interaction
between the more =
mature pairing, Hijikata and Kondou is absolutely
exciting and contrasts wi=
th the dominance and submission psychology in
the Toudou and Serizawa coupl=
e.

The homosexuality in the work deviates for a refreshing mxf romance
I'l=
l not reveal here.

My only complaint is I wanted more action. I hope that =
the female lead
becomes more developed in the sequel.

GOJOU HAJIME is a re=
laxing read where the plot is based on emotional
and physical reaction betw=
een characters.  

[BLURB]
During Japan's 1800's the samurai
became dissati=
sfied with the shogun
for opening their isolated nation to
the Western Barb=
arians. Many
rebelled and plotted to overthrow
the shogun and restore their=
 emperor
to a seat of power. The shogun
arranged a band of expert swordsmen=

to manage the revolution. Given the
name, Shinsengumi (Newly Selected
Corp=
s), the brave men were
commissioned to eliminate the unruly
samurai and ron=
in, sanctioned to kill.
The men lived for the moment, for their
lives could=
 end in an instant. Under
stressful circumstances some of the
men turned to=
 one another for comfort,
but how far did they venture from there
into the =
realm of taboo?
A fascinating historical, gay, yaoi,
erotic fiction for the=
 adult reader 18+.
